title: József Kanta
text:
József Kanta (born 24 March 1984) is a <a href="Hungary">Hungarian</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player for <a href="MTK%20Hung%C3%A1ria%20FC">MTK Budapest</a> and has also represented the <a href="Hungary%20national%20football%20team">Hungary national football team</a>. He won the first of his two caps against Cyprus on 6 February 2007.
In 2006, he got the <a href="Ferenc%20Pusk%C3%A1s%20prize">Ferenc Puskás prize</a> and, in 2008, he got the <a href="J%C3%B3zsef%20Bozsik%20prize">József Bozsik prize</a> from the <a href="Hungarian%20Football%20Federation">Hungarian Football Federation</a>.
Honours.
MTK Hungária FC
Club statistics.
"Updated to games played as of 15 May 2021."
